subject: No Credit Is Necessary to Get this Visa Card
body:
Now you can get your All-Access Visa Prepaid Card
with all these great features:









SAFER THAN CARRYING CASH
	
100% APPROVED**
	
NO UPFRONT PAYMENT
	
NO CREDIT CHECK



Click here to get your card now!














*NetSpend All-Access Visa Prepaid Cards are issued by MetaBank, member FDIC. NetSpend is an authorized Independent Sales Organization ("ISO") of MetaBank. Subject to funds availability. Transaction fees, terms and conditions apply. All trademarks, service marks and registered marks are the properties of their respective owners. Â© 2001-2007 NetSpend Corporation.


**100% approval of card requests is based on our ability to verify personal information provided. This does not involve a credit check.

















If you wish to unsubscribe from this mailing list please click here 
or write to Netspend Corporation, 701 Brazos St., Austin, TX 78701.
